DoseInfo.Summary: Strength of HS processing is constant and not dose dependent.
If exposure value is low, the amount of HS processing is increase.
Strength of HS processing is constant and not dose dependent. Main purpose is to balance granularity and sharpness.
If exposure value is low, the amount of HS processing is increase. Main purpose is to balance granularity and sharpness.
It is processing for LG images.

DensInfo.Summary: Strength of HS processing is constant and not image density depend.
Strength of HS processing varies with image density and has strong effect for low density areas.
Strength of HS processing varies with image density and has strong effect for high density areas.
